title: HAP 104 - In Unity Lies Strength - Kwame Nkrumah
itunes:title: HAP 104 - In Unity Lies Strength - Kwame Nkrumah
description: The first leader of independent Ghana, Kwame Nkrumah, writes against neocolonialism and in favor of socialism and Pan-Africanism.
